name: Dash 2D
description:
Dash 2D is a dynamic platform game whose the objective is simple:
Collect the "biomes" to unlock the exit door while avoiding obstacles.

In the game you take control of Dash, a ghostly character with the appearance of a bomb.

You will be able to jump and dash endlessly!

Finishing a level is good, but catching the star before it disappears is better!

YOU CAN PLAY ON THE KEYBOARD BUT IT IS MORE COMFORTABLE WITH A CONTROLLER

Join our community

Join us on the networks to participate in the development of the game, help us improve it or even give us your opinion.
